@graph.caption: Slices of apple ginger bread on a blue background

@graph.name: Apple Ginger Bread. - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Apple ginger bread. A mildly sweet loaf that can be used as sandwich bread, or whenever you need white bread! Vegan Recipe.

@graph.name: Apple Ginger Bread
@graph.description: Apple ginger bread. A mildly sweet loaf that can be used as sandwich bread, or whenever you need white bread! Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1.5 teaspoons quick rise yeast and .5 teaspoon regular active yeast

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the water and add yeast to it. Let sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm the water and add yeast to it. Let sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease the mixer bowl and add the flours, bran, sugar and salt to it. Start with 2 cups (260g) bread flour and add more later if necessary.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease the mixer bowl and add the flours, bran, sugar and salt to it. Start with 2 cups (260g) bread flour and add more later if necessary.

recipeInstructions.text: Puree the Apple and ginger with little water to get a nice smooth puree.
recipeInstructions.name: Puree the Apple and ginger with little water to get a nice smooth puree.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the puree, oil, lime juice and yeast to the flours and give a mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the puree, oil, lime juice and yeast to the flours and give a mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the yeast mixture and knead. Add more flour or water if necessary.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the yeast mixture and knead. Add more flour or water if necessary.

recipeInstructions.text: As with all watery fruits, the fruit will give out more moisture with time, so try to keep the dough a little on the dry side.
recipeInstructions.name: As with all watery fruits, the fruit will give out more moisture with time, so try to keep the dough a little on the dry side.

recipeInstructions.text: Knead for 10-12 minutes( 2-3 minute batches in mixer with intermittent scraping)
recipeInstructions.name: Knead for 10-12 minutes( 2-3 minute batches in mixer with intermittent scraping)

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a well oiled container, spray some oil, cover with plastic wrap with enough room to double in size.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a well oiled container, spray some oil, cover with plastic wrap with enough room to double in size.

recipeInstructions.text: Punch dough down after an hour an half.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch dough down after an hour an half.

recipeInstructions.text: Shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking it under.
recipeInstructions.name: Shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking it under.

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf in greased bread pan and cover with kitchen towel.
recipeInstructions.name: Place loaf in greased bread pan and cover with kitchen towel.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 375 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until nice, golden and sounds hollow.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 375 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until nice, golden and sounds hollow.

recipeInstructions.text: Take bread out of bread pan and cool completely before slicing!
recipeInstructions.name: Take bread out of bread pan and cool completely before slicing!

recipeInstructions.text: I store all breads with any fruit in it in the refrigerator and use them within 4-5 days.
recipeInstructions.name: I store all breads with any fruit in it in the refrigerator and use them within 4-5 days.

@graph.keywords: easy bread recipe, fruit bread, vegan bread recipe
